__e: How is this any different from when your mother shot you and you came to me for help?
What we do isn't so different from what you do.
I don't expect you to understand now but one day you're going to wake up and you're going to look in the mirror and you're going to see someone who's not all that different from me.
"Oh. " Domenico tries to find out which of the lads is his, but he totally fails, since each is like him in some ways and completely different in others.
I believe you're right, though we come at it by different routes.
You are free to take your own path and that path will be different for all of you.
